attributes.action: to stop this girl gudies fro being knocked dowm and being rebuilt please
attributes.additional_details: A girl guides hut should not be knocked down and tried to get rebuilt up are way because people just come up park on the side of the road and clear of to work and never know how to use a car park machine when up are road its for a bus root and people also try to have the check to use the residents car park spaces when its for the residents only and they have garages cant even get into parking into them so its not right and when anyone who lives in the houses want to do anything to there back gardens they would not be able to see because of the girl guides hut trying to take the spaces
